citation.article-title: Serinicoccus chungangensis sp. nov., isolated from tidal flat sediment, and emended description of the genus Serinicoccus
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Serinicoccus Yi et al. 2004
The description of the genus Serinicoccus is as given by Yi et al. (2004) and Xiao et al. (2011) with the following amendments.
The cell-wall peptidoglycan is based on l-ornithine, glutamic acid, alanine, glycine and serine or meso-diaminopimelic acid.
The polar lipids are diphosphatidylglycerol, phosphatidylglycerol and phosphatidylinositol.
The G+C content of the DNA is in the range 72â€“73.5 mol%.
